<< clf Graphics functions close >>

clim

Set colormap limits.

Syntax

clim(limits)
clim('auto')
clim('manual')
clim(ax, ...)
lims = clim()

Input argument

limits

New limits: [cmin cmax].

'auto'

enables automatic limit updates when values in the colormap indexing array change.

'manual'

disables automatic limit update.

ax

Target object: axes graphics object.

Output argument

lims

[cmin cmax]

Description

clim set or get colormap limits.

Examples

f = figure();
[X,Y] = meshgrid(-5:.5:5);
Z = X .^ 2 + Y .^ 2;
surf(Z);
limits = clim()


f = figure();
[X,Y] = meshgrid(-5:.5:5);
Z = X.^2 + Y.^2;
surf(Z);
clim([25 75])
limits = clim()

See also

colormap, colorbar.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
